questionTitle: Look over there  ____  is the biggest pumpkin I've ever seen!
Matthew, take ____  and put it over there.
Her eyes shining, the little girl pointed to ____  piece of candy.
____ elephants are sleeping under the shade of the baobab tree over there.
____  are the best days of our lives.
____  students at the administration office want to transfer to our school.
The pilot calmly steered us through ____  big cloud .
____  film  Dad saw last week seems like an interesting movie to watch.
May I buy five of ____  pictures hanging over there, please?
